original_text: For the wave breast and the heave shoulder have I taken of the children of Israel from off the sacrifices of their peace offerings, and have given them unto Aaron the priest and unto his sons by a statute for ever from among the children of Israel.
korean_text: 내가 이스라엘 자손의 화목제물 중에서 그 흔든 가슴과 든 뒷다리를 가져다가 제사장 아론과 그의 자손에게 주었나니 이는 이스라엘 자손에게서 받을 영원한 소득이니라

sentences.original_text: For the wave breast and the heave shoulder have I taken of the children of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이스라엘 자손들에게서 흔들 가슴과 들어 올린 어깨를 취했습니다

sentences.original_text: from off the sacrifices of their peace offerings
and have given them unto Aaron the priest
from among the children of Israel
